pageContext.title: HBC 369
pageContext.tagline: Single Hop India Pale Ale â€“ 2012.
pageContext.description: HBC 369 brings rich fruity flavours with the tiniest layer of candy coating on top. HBC 369 (the hop) can bring notes of blueberries, pear, and possibly even sweet potato. HBC 369 (the beer) was balanced, with just one hop providing a complex aroma, and a dry bitterness.
pageContext.author: Sam Mason <samjbmason>
